en.subtitle: Calculate your current and cumulative GPA easily!
en.popup:
How to Use the Tool

  • Enter the number of courses you have registered for this semester (excluding courses not counted in the cumulative GPA).
  • Enter your current GPA.
  • Enter the number of credit hours you have completed in previous semesters (excluding the current semester).
  • If this is your first semester, enter 0 for both your GPA and previous credit hours.

After that, you will see two fields for each course:

  • The first to select the grade you received in this course.
  • The second to enter the credit hours for the course.

When finished, click the "Calculate GPA" button, and the following results will appear:

  • Current Semester GPA: GPA for the most recent semester.
  • New Total Cumulative GPA: The updated overall GPA after including this semester's results.
en.numOfSubjHelp: The number of subjects you registered in the current semester (Semester you want to calculate its GPA)
en.prevGPAHelp: Your previous Total GPA (Maximum value: 4) (The total GPA before the current semester)
en.totalPrevCreditsHelp: Total credit hours you have taken before the current semester (The total credit hours not included in the current semester)
en.noteThat: Please note that the clculations are based on the following:
en.math: <math xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML\"><mi>Semester GPA</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∑</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>Grade Points</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>Credit Hours</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>Total Semester Credit Hours</mi></mrow></mfrac></math> <math xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML\"><mi>Cumulative GPA</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∑</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>Semester GPA</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>Semester Credit Hours</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>Total Accumulated Credit Hours</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
